content: **crochet drops hat with fan pattern in muskat ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no r-634 yarn group b ----------------------------------------------------------- **size** s/m - l/xl head circumference approx 54/56 - 58/60 cm / 21¼ /22 - 22¾ /23½ **materials** drops muskat from garnstudio 150-200 g color no 61 light beige drops crochet hook size 4 mm / g/6 or size needed to get 18 double_crochet x 9 row vertically = 10 x 10 cm / 4 x 4
